items.summary: There is currently very unhealthy air quality due to smoke from the ongoing fire activity. For additional air quality information, pleasevisit Napa County Public Health's Air Quality information page. __ La calidad del aire no e...

items.title: COVID-19 Guidance for Fire Evacuees
items.summary: COVID-19 Guidance for Fire Evacuees Individuals who are seeking shelter are reminded to bring a face covering, practice good hygiene habits, such as handwashing, and adhere to social distancing protocols.If you have been evacuated due to the fire...
